metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7572 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The _checkPolkitPrivilege function in serviceHelper.py in Back In Time (aka backintime) 1.1.18 and earlier uses a deprecated polkit authorization method (unix-process) that is subject to a race condition (time of check, time of use). With this authorization method, the owner of a process requesting a polkit operation is checked by polkitd via /proc/<pid>/status, by which time the requesting process may have been replaced by a different process with the same PID that has different privileges then the original requester.

criterions.comment: backintime: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
